mapper.select: /* QuarterTeamRecordsRepository.findQuarterRecordsByJoinTeamSeq */ SELECT QUARTER_TEAM_RECORDS_SEQ , GAME_SEQ , GAME_JOIN_TEAM_SEQ , QUARTER_CODE , QUARTER_TIME , FREE_THROW , TWO_POINT , THREE_POINT , REBOUND , STEAL , BLOCK , TURNOVER , FOUL FROM QUARTER_TEAM_RECORDS WHERE 1=1 AND GAME_JOIN_TEAM_SEQ = #{gameJoinTeamSeq}
